genesis.getYourGenesisSubs: For every NFT you buy on the NFTGenesis, you automatically receive a generous 2% share of the marketing revenues generated from subsequent NFT Farm sales. That's right, simply by being an NFTShare investor, you become an active contributor to the growth and promotion of the entire NFT marketplace.
genesis.youDontOwn: You don't own any NFT Genesis
genesis.successMessage: Success! Thank you for your purchase

home.quotes: We will always do the right thing and work together to succeed. By constantly improving ourselves, we aim to achieve even greater things as a community

description.title: Private sale new token project launch
Private sale new token project launch

feature.title: FEATURES
feature.subtitle: We believe in the power of decentralized governance and community-driven decision-making. Our DAO is designed to empower every member, ensuring that your voice is heard and your contributions are valued.

fullTransparency.title: Transparent Operations
fullTransparency.subtitle: Transparency is at the core of our DAO. All transactions and decisions are recorded on the blockchain, making our operations open and verifiable for everyone.

fullAutomation.title: Secure and Reliable
fullAutomation.subtitle: Security is our top priority. Our platform utilizes cutting-edge blockchain technology to ensure that your assets and data are protected at all times.

smartContract.title: Incentive Structures
smartContract.subtitle: Contributions are rewarded! Our DAO incentivizes participation through various reward mechanisms, ensuring that your efforts are recognized and compensated.

decentralized.title: Easy Onboarding
decentralized.subtitle: New to DAOs? No problem. Our user-friendly interface and comprehensive guides make it easy for anyone to join and start participating.

matchingBonusv2.title:

Community
matchingBonusv2.description: Be a part of a worldwide movement. Join us and connect with innovators and visionaries from around the globe. Your voice matters. Let's shape the futureÂ together!

populationSection.title: WANG CAPITAL Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO)
populationSection.content: We create a world where decentralized governance empowers communities, fosters innovation, and ensures transparency, security, and equitable growth for all.
